item.name: Putrid Sack of Rotting Fruit
entries: Each of these unassuming sacks contains enough rotting fruit to provide a fungus leshy with 1 week's worth of rations, along with clusters of stones to help press out the fruit's juices. Since their last adventure, Reaching Rings has refined their rations's ability to serve as a weapon in addition to delicious, flavorful sustenance.

A sack of rotting fruit has a range increment of 20 feet. When you succeed at a ranged {@action Strike} on a creature by hurling a putrid sack of rotten fruit at them, the sack is consumed while the creature takes {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage and must attempt a DC 17 Fortitude save.

Success: The creature is unaffected by the foul smell of the fruit.
